guest_info.name: Joel Schaub
guest_info.title: Vice President of Lending
guest_info.production_level: Closed 319 transactions for $126 million last year

problems_addressed.specific_problem: Clients hesitant to buy due to higher interest rates
problems_addressed.solution_summary: Encourage buying now with current rates and refinancing later when rates drop; use temporary rate buy downs.

problems_addressed.specific_problem: Agents not actively reaching out to potential clients
problems_addressed.solution_summary: Educate clients on market conditions and available loan products to generate interest and leads.

target_avatars.relevance: This episode provides strategies to overcome client objections related to interest rates.
target_avatars.key_takeaway: Educate clients on the benefits of buying now and refinancing later, using tools like temporary rate buy downs.

target_avatars.relevance: Offers insights on how to differentiate through education and value.
target_avatars.key_takeaway: Leverage relationships with loan officers to provide clients with unique financing solutions.

clip_worthy_moments.quote: If the rates dropped by 200 basis points tomorrow, think about how much competition is now flooding that same market.
clip_worthy_moments.why_clipworthy: Highlights the potential market shift and urgency to act now.
clip_worthy_moments.suggested_hook: Why waiting for lower rates might backfire on homebuyers.

clip_worthy_moments.quote: If you can take off your selling shoes, put on your education and helping shoes, you're going to grow your business.
clip_worthy_moments.why_clipworthy: Encourages a shift from selling to educating, which can resonate with many agents.
clip_worthy_moments.suggested_hook: The secret to growing your real estate business in 2023.

key_tactics.tactic: Use temporary rate buy downs to make current rates more attractive.
key_tactics.context: When clients are hesitant to buy due to current interest rates.

key_tactics.tactic: Educate clients on the benefits of buying now and refinancing later.
key_tactics.context: When discussing market conditions with potential buyers.

quotable_insights: Lead with honesty and get your plan together for 2023.
Educating the borrowers is key to growing your business.

resources_mentioned.name: Real Geeks
resources_mentioned.context: Recommended as a tool for lead conversion and CRM for agents.

resources_mentioned.name: Freddie Mac
resources_mentioned.context: To check area median income for loan programs.

episode_summary: In this episode, Joel Schaub discusses strategies for real estate agents to navigate the current market conditions, focusing on educating clients about temporary rate buy downs and the benefits of buying now. He emphasizes the importance of providing value and leveraging loan officer relationships to offer unique financing solutions. The episode encourages agents to shift from a sales mindset to an educational approach to grow their business in 2023.
